contactInformation.address: Unit 6B, Chieftain Way, Triumph Business Park, Speke, Liverpool, L24 9PB

endorsements.endorsement: Volunteering in A&E, I see the love and dedication of the staff at the Royal Hospital. I know beyond doubt that Amanda has been the best advocate for our community and has fought to get the best deal for us locally.

We are both ex UKIP voters. We believe that only Theresa May, Amanda Solloway and the Conservatives can provide stable leadership that the entire country can trust to take us through Brexit negotiations.

Amanda has helped me tremendously. She shared her business knowledge and many expert contacts which I took advantage of when I set up my first business trading in old and rare bottles. I'm selling them to collectors all over the world and Amanda has always been there to offer advice along the way.
You are a star, Amanda! You are a very hard working woman and you always support all the community.

leaflet.additionalNotes: It is mentioned that Amanda Solloway is standing with Theresa May to stand up for Britain. There are endorsements from local constituents, one of which mentions support due to efforts around Brexit negotiations. The endorsements serve to highlight community support and positive local impact.
